job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>REQUIREMENTS</strong></p><p><strong>As a member of the team, you will:</strong></p><ul><li>Be responsible for our end-to-end machine learning pipeline, from model development to production deployment.</li><li>Build the team and drive the direction of the company.</li><li>Shape our product and culture.</li><li>Experience the direct impact of what you build on hundreds of millions of people’s financial lives.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Required Skills:</strong></p><ul><li>Python</li><li>Machine&nbsp;Learning</li><li>Rust</li><li>NLP</li><li>PyTorch</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>The following is a big plus:</strong></p><ul><li>Fluency in Python and PyTorch</li><li>Experience with training and deploying models in multi-GPU environments</li><li>Recognized open-source contributions</li><li>Participation in competitive programming events (CTFs, IOI, IMO, Topcoder, Kaggle, etc.)</li></ul>
